alert.note: Alert for Boone; Polk; Story; Warren (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 23 at 6:31PM CDT until April 23 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL POLK...SOUTHWESTERN STORY...SOUTHEASTERN BOONE AND NORTHWESTERN WARREN COUNTIES... At 631 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Madrid to near Polk City to near Windsor Heights, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Law enforcement. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Des Moines, Ames, West Des Moines, Ankeny, Urbandale, Johnston, Clive, Altoona, Norwalk, Pleasant Hill, Windsor Heights, Bondurant, Polk City, Huxley, Saylorville, Slater, Iowa State Center, Adventureland Amusement Park, Merle Hay Mall and Iowa Events Center. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
